name: Clutter IX: Clutter IXtreme
description:
Clutter IX: Clutter IXtreme is the best Clutter yet, with 1100 puzzles for your entertainment.

As always, Clutter levels are highly addicting and replayable, with many new Clutter variations mixed in with your old favorites for a Quest you won't forget.
In addition, there are Sliders, Square Jigsaws & Box Quotes included.



Just wait until you see the new IXtreme (Extreme) variations!
You've never seen Clutter this fast & furious.

Options allow you to play Clutter the way you want.
And Favorites are back so you can collect the puzzles you want to play again and again.

Features

  • New objects and new music
  • Brand new gameplay modes
  • Over 100 picture puzzles and box quotes puzzles
  • Randomly generated levels mean endless replayability
